content: Kwik Bolt 3 Wedge anchor SS304 High-performance wedge anchor with everyday approvals for uncracked concrete (304 stainless steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Approved by ICC-ES for concrete Rounded end for easy installation Dog point impact section to prevent thread damage during installation Testing according to AC193 results in smallest edge distance and spacing for all wedge anchors in class Also available in carbon steel, hot-dip galvanized and 316 SS Applications Fastening structural steel Attaching exterior hand rails and signs Fastening exterior seating and bleachers Glazing Fastening curtain wall and masonry facade ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless Steel, 304 Head configuration: Externally threaded Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Miami Dade County, Nuclear (NQA-1) Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless Steel, 304 | Head configuration | Externally threaded | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Miami Dade County, Nuclear (NQA-1) | Base materials | Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening, Through-fastening | Installation tools | TE 6-22 Cordless rotary hammer, SIW 4AT-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor with temporary condensation, Outdoor (more than 1km to coast) ### ITEMS- 282546 -
